${ModID}:ID_5.NAME: Careless Punch
${ModID}:ID_5.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Discard 1 card. Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:ID_6.NAME: Recoup
${ModID}:ID_6.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 Sneak Up with Exhaust to your hand for every card you discarded this turn.

${ModID}:ID_8.NAME: Daring Draw
${ModID}:ID_8.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Retain Basic cards when this card is retained. Discard 3 cards. Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:ID_10.NAME: Bare-knuckle Punch
${ModID}:ID_10.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each card discarded this turn. Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:ID_11.NAME: Crowd Cutter
${ModID}:ID_11.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:ID_12.NAME: Explore Options
${ModID}:ID_12.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 Card. Draw !M! cards. Discard all cards drawn this way that do not share the discarded cards type.

${ModID}:ID_13.NAME: Disengage
${ModID}:ID_13.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block X times.

${ModID}:ID_14.NAME: Stay Alert
${ModID}:ID_14.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Block X times next turn.

${ModID}:ID_15.NAME: Hissy Fit
${ModID}:ID_15.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to 2 cards. Deal !D! damage. Deal !D! for every discarded card.

${ModID}:ID_16.NAME: Pre-planned
${ModID}:ID_16.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard 2 cards. Draw !M! extra card{!Upgrades!|>0=s} next turn.

${ModID}:ID_17.NAME: Sneak up
${ModID}:ID_17.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Mark. Deal !D! for every Mark.

${ModID}:ID_18.NAME: Collateral Damage
${ModID}:ID_18.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Mark deal !D! to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_21.NAME: Caution
${ModID}:ID_21.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. When discarded apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_22.NAME: Lash out
${ModID}:ID_22.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. When discarded deal !M! to ALL enemies. Return this card from the discard pile whenever you discard a card from your hand.

${ModID}:ID_23.NAME: Lightningclap
${ModID}:ID_23.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and deal !D! to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_24.NAME: Repurpose
${ModID}:ID_24.DESCRIPTION: Swap the base numbers of two cards.

${ModID}:ID_26.NAME: Insurance
${ModID}:ID_26.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw or discard a card this turn gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:ID_27.NAME: Caffeine
${ModID}:ID_27.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

${ModID}:ID_28.NAME: Banana Toss
${ModID}:ID_28.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. Reduce ALL enemies strength by the cards cost times !M!.

${ModID}:ID_29.NAME: Double
${ModID}:ID_29.DESCRIPTION: Select a card. Double every stat of the card.

${ModID}:ID_30.NAME: Headstart
${ModID}:ID_30.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, the first !M! cost X card{!Upgrades!|>0=s} do{!Upgrades!|<1=es}n't consume energy.

${ModID}:ID_31.NAME: Raising Bars
${ModID}:ID_31.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Innate.} The effect of cost X cards will always be at least !M!.

${ModID}:ID_33.NAME: Take Five
${ModID}:ID_33.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{The next {!Upgrades!|@=Gain 5 Strength. Gain 5 Dexterity. Gain 5 Mark. Gain 5 [E] next turn. Draw 5 cards next turn.|>0=Choose five times between five effects.}

${ModID}:ID_35.NAME: Reversal
${ModID}:ID_35.DESCRIPTION: Swap your draw pile with your discard pile.

${ModID}:ID_36.NAME: Stay Sharp
${ModID}:ID_36.DESCRIPTION: {@@}When you discard the next X cards, play the top card of your discard pile. {!Upgrades!|<1=Exhaust.}

${ModID}:ID_37.NAME: Protective Hat
${ModID}:ID_37.DESCRIPTION: When this card is discarded heal !M! and exhaust this card.

${ModID}:ID_38.NAME: Horrify
${ModID}:ID_38.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal damage this turn apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.}

${ModID}:ID_39.NAME: Countdown
${ModID}:ID_39.DESCRIPTION: After !M! cards are discarded deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_40.NAME: Anger Form
${ModID}:ID_40.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever an attack is played put X{!Upgrades!|>0=+1} copies of it into your discard pile.

${ModID}:ID_41.NAME: Fundraiser
${ModID}:ID_41.DESCRIPTION: When this card is drawn exhaust it and draw !M! cards. Lose 1 [E] at the start of next turn.

${ModID}:ID_42.NAME: Charged Punch
${ModID}:ID_42.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal{!Upgrades!|>0= !D! damage plus} damage equal to the amount of cards in your discard pile.

${ModID}:ID_43.NAME: Hook Punch
${ModID}:ID_43.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every X card in your deck.

${ModID}:ID_45.NAME: Choo-Choo Mail
${ModID}:ID_45.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Innate.} At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mark.

${ModID}:ID_46.NAME: Night Watch
${ModID}:ID_46.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. When this card is discarded gain !M! [E] and exhaust this card.

${ModID}:ID_49.NAME: Compost Heap
${ModID}:ID_49.DESCRIPTION: {@@}After a card has been discarded reduce the cost of the top card of of your discard pile {!Upgrades!|@=by 1|>0=to 0} [E].

${ModID}:ID_50.NAME: Struggle
${ModID}:ID_50.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain that much Block.

${ModID}:ID_51.NAME: Opportunity
${ModID}:ID_51.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Discard 3 cards, Draw 1 card for every turn this card has been retained. (!M!)

${ModID}:ID_52.NAME: Improve Potency
${ModID}:ID_52.DESCRIPTION: When you play the next cost X card, its effects are increased by !M!.

${ModID}:ID_53.NAME: Hyperfocus
${ModID}:ID_53.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 [E] at the start of your turn. Draw 1 card less per turn.

${ModID}:ID_54.NAME: Amp up
${ModID}:ID_54.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each [E] spent on this card. This card costs 1 more this combat.

${ModID}:ID_55.NAME: Punch Line
${ModID}:ID_55.DESCRIPTION: If a Punch card is in your draw pile, discard pile and exhaust pile !D! damage.

${ModID}:ID_60.NAME: Power Punch
${ModID}:ID_60.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Punches cost 1 [E] less. {!Upgrades!|>0=Draw a card whenever you play a Punch.}

${ModID}:ID_63.NAME: Cleanup
${ModID}:ID_63.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity for every card you discard this turn.

${ModID}:ID_64.NAME: Take the Deal
${ModID}:ID_64.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add !M! Bargain into your hand.

${ModID}:ID_66.NAME: Smokescreen
${ModID}:ID_66.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Enemy loses Strength equal to the cost of that card.

${ModID}:ID_67.NAME: Splatter
${ModID}:ID_67.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy dies deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_68.NAME: Rummaging
${ModID}:ID_68.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 [E] for every 4 cards in your discard pile.

${ModID}:ID_69.NAME: Kollekte
${ModID}:ID_69.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to ALL enemies. Add !M! Bargain into your hand for each enemy hit.

${ModID}:ID_70.NAME: Rip off
${ModID}:ID_70.DESCRIPTION: When ever you play a Bargain ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:ID_71.NAME: Sacrificial Pawn
${ModID}:ID_71.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{The next {!Upgrades!|@=card that gets discarded returns to your hand.|>0=two cards that get discarded return to your hand.}

${ModID}:ID_72.NAME: Second Hand
${ModID}:ID_72.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your discard pile. Exhaust.

${ModID}:ID_73.NAME: Great Deal
${ModID}:ID_73.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a X card is played add !M! Bargain into your hand.

${ModID}:ID_74.NAME: Last Ditch Effort
${ModID}:ID_74.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M!*X Energy. Draw X cards. Gain X Fading. {!Upgrades!|@=Ethereal|>0=Retain}
